Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Seven families were found to have the FGFR3 P250R mutation , and one individual was found to have an FGFR2 VV269 - 270 deletion .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Disease |
| --- |
| FGFR3 P250R mutation |
| FGFR2 VV269-270 deletion |
```
The two disease entities in the paragraph are:

1. FGFR3 P250R mutation
2. FGFR2 VV269-270 deletion

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid disease entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| FGFR3 P250R mutation |

The entity "FGFR2 VV269-270 deletion" does not clearly refer to a disease, so it has been removed from the table.
